sentences: Kui õnnetus tuleb, siis tuleb uksest ja aknast.
context: The word 'aknast' is an Estonian inessive case (inessiiv) form meaning 'from the window'. It indicates movement away from or out of a location, specifically from the window. In the example sentence 'Kui õnnetus tuleb, siis tuleb uksest ja aknast', it means 'When misfortune comes, it comes through doors and windows' - indicating that bad things can come from multiple directions/sources.
